query: " let $startFrom := _STARTFROM_ let $countToFetch := _COUNTTOFETCH_ let $list2 := for $b in #OBJ_TagObjectFilter_OBJ# where $b_WHEREXPATH_ order by _SORTXPATH_ _SORTORDER_ return $b let $list3 := subsequence($list2, $startFrom, $countToFetch) let $list := for $b in $list3 return <record jsxid='{ data($b/@NID) }' jsxtext='{ data($b//Name) }' > </record> let $records := <data jsxid='jsxroot'>{$list}</data> let $result := insert-before($records,1, <GetListObjectResponseData> <ObjectCount> { count($list2)} </ObjectCount> <ObjectLastWhereEndCount>{$startFrom}</ObjectLastWhereEndCount> <CountToFetch>{$countToFetch}</CountToFetch> </GetListObjectResponseData> ) return <result>{$result}</result>"
